<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Validate organization name"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/orgs/validate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Confirms that the given organization name is valid and available for use. Append `?name=<your_org_name>` to specify the name to validate.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"name","in":"query","description":"The organization name to validate for availability and format compliance.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
